RDK2::Geometry::Viewport

RDK2::Geometry::Viewport Class Reference

#include <viewport.h>

Collaboration diagram for RDK2::Geometry::Viewport:

[legend]

Detailed Description

Provides a viewport (??? trasformation) over a dmatrix. Storage is delegated to DMatrix without crippling that class with coordinates methods.

Note: it is *very* important that the two mappings defined by b2w and w2b be consistent.

All the w2b throws invalid_argument if the coordinates are not valid.

Definition at line 44 of file viewport.h.

bool RDK2::Geometry::Viewport::crossesSegment ( const Point2d &  p0,
const Point2d &  p1 
) const

Check whether the segment p0-p1 crosses this rectangle. It crosses if p0 or p1 are inside, or p0-p1 crosses any of the sides.
